meta.description: Context Sensitive Help for the table "tx_partner_contact_info"

languageKey.label: Type of the contact information
Chose the type of the contact information. The possible types are defined by the Partner-Extension.
Nature of the contact information
Chose the nature of the contact information. The possible natures are defined by the Partner-Extension.
Standard-Flag

You can set this flag for exactly one contact information per type. For instance, you can declare exactly one e-mail address as the standard e-mail. The label of the standard-entry will be prefixed with a '*'.
Label of the contact information

The label is used in many places in the backend, usually when the contact information has to be described with just one field. This label is for instance displayed when editing a partner record. The value of the label is formed automatically by TYPO3.
Country of the phone number
By chosing the country, TYPO3 will automatically select the international phone prefix (e.g. +41 for Switzerland).
Area Code of the phone number
Enter the area code, but only if applicable.
Phone Number
Enter the phone number, but without the area code and without an extension.
tx_partner_contact_info:area_code,tx_partner_contact_info:extension
Extension of the phone number
Usually used for business phone numbers. Normally corresponds to the internal phone number within an organisation.
E-Mail address
Enter the complete e-mail address, but without mailto:
URL (Homepage)
Enter the complete URL (Homepage) of the partner.
Remarks for the contact information
Free text to further describe details about this contact information.
